the-year-of-the-gnome.title: The Year of the GNOME
the-year-of-the-gnome.intro: This talk would isabout all the cool new things happening within GNOME, like our move to GitLab, the policies we changed, the donations we are receiving, and the growth we are planning for. GNOME is trying to do more to support community members around the world, and this talk aims to share how we are doing that and how you can start to participate in GNOME's growth this year and in years to come!
the-year-of-the-gnome.addition:
* Language: English
* Audience: Everyone, not technical, newcomers
* Difficulty: Begineer / 入門

Nuritzi Sanchez.speaker: Nuritzi Sanchez
Nuritzi Sanchez.name: Nuritzi Sanchez
Nuritzi Sanchez.intro: Nuritzi has served two terms as the elected Chairman of the Board for the GNOME Foundation. She is a core member of the GNOME Engagement team, and the founder of GNOME SF, a meetup group in San Francisco, California. In her professional life, Nuritzi has helped start two companies, including most recently, Endless, whose mission is to make computing universally accessible by making an operating system that is designed for the next billion users and based on GNOME.
